QuestData.Title: Artisan's Supply: Surveyor's Cloth Bands
QuestData.Description:
Are you looking for work, tailor? The Artisan's Consortium asked me to craft some wristbands for their customers.
While I appreciate that these explorers are trying to involve themselves with our weaving, I do not have time for such requests.
Perhaps you would be interested in taking on this project?
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Surveyor's Cloth Bands to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver Surveyor's Cloth Bands to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.

Objectives.Objective: Deliver Surveyor's Cloth Bands to Haephesta
